title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Skills: Information Literacy Framework for AI Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and societal impact of generative AI.
Learners can perform procedures to evaluate the credibility of AI-generated content by applying an information literacy framework.
Learners can complete a project applying AI tools in real workplace scenarios based on ethical AI utilization guidelines.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
